cap_description: Generate vector embeddings from text or file input

required.name: output
required.arg_description: Output JSON file path to write embeddings

optional.name: text
optional.arg_description: Input text to generate embeddings for

optional.name: file
optional.arg_description: Path to input file to generate embeddings from

optional.name: model
optional.arg_description: Model name to use for embedding generation

optional.name: chunk_size
optional.arg_description: Chunk size in words for splitting input text

optional.name: chunk_overlap
optional.arg_description: Chunk overlap in words when splitting input text

optional.name: include
optional.arg_description: File include pattern (can be provided multiple times)

optional.name: exclude
optional.arg_description: File exclude pattern (can be provided multiple times)

output.output_description: JSON file containing embeddings, chunk metadata and model information
